title: Hint
text: Resolve the nurse's force into horizontal and vertical components. Apply Newton's second law $$(F=ma)$$ to find the horizontal force needed to overcome friction and maintain constant velocity.

title: Steps
text: Step 1: Resolve the nurse's force into horizontal and vertical components. Step 2: Apply Newton's second law $$(F=ma)$$ to find the horizontal force needed to overcome friction and maintain constant velocity. Step 3: Clearly show all calculations and units.
